description:
MobiDeals is exclusively distributed and brought to you by Sinclair Broadcast Group.

Forget about forgetting your coupons at home ever again! With MobiDeals, great offers from businesses all over town are zapped to your mobile phone with just one click!

Businesses are doing all they can to earn your business, and they're offering fantastic savings exclusive to MobiDeals: half off or buy one get one free, free items with an additional purchase, money off, percentages off, huge discounts, and more!

Coupons are geo-targeted to your town, your zip code, or your exact current location using your phone's GPS. Download the app to access hundreds of great local offers. You'll find deals from restaurants, shops, stores and businesses you visit everyday, and from great places you've been meaning to try.

MobiDeals are available in these cities:

Asheville, NC / Greenville, SC
Baltimore, MD
Birmingham, AL
Buffalo, NY
Cedar Rapids, IA
Champaign/Springfield, IL
Charleston, SC
Charleston, WV
Cincinnati, OH
Columbus, OH
